definition: to be chosen/to be elected as
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Only shortlisted applicants will be contacted for further assessment.
sentences.chinese: 本局只会联络初步入选的申请人作进一步评核。

sentences.english: The selected STTR projects have a combined value of roughly ＄3.2 million.
sentences.chinese: 入选STTR计划的合同总价值约为32亿美元。

sentences.english: Khalid Boulahrouz receives his first call-up for Holland as a Chelsea player.
sentences.chinese: 布拉鲁兹在转会到切尔西以后第一次入选了国家队。

sentences.english: Soon after she was selected, Ms. Fauci re-enlisted for four more years.
sentences.chinese: 在她入选后不久，费希女士将服役期限延长了四年。

sentences.english: Xu said that some millionaire women had also entered the event.
sentences.chinese: 徐总说，入选者中还有一些女富翁。

sentences.english: The Auxerre right back was named the players' player of the year in his position in France last season.
sentences.chinese: 这位欧赛尔右后卫入选了上赛季法甲年度最佳阵容。

sentences.english: Card also selected the latest test of the German national team.
sentences.chinese: 卡考也入选了最新一期的德国国家队。

sentences.english: 1986 《farmhouse 》select to leave for the Canadian art exchanges exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 1986年《农舍》入选赴加拿大美术交流展。

sentences.english: China Mobile stands out as a rep of the new China.
sentences.chinese: 中国移动的入选代表了新中国的形象。

sentences.english: Demographic and surgical data were collected for neurologically monitorable patients.
sentences.chinese: 收集入选患者的人口统计学及外科相关资料。

sentences.english: A trial game was arranged between possibles and probables.
sentences.chinese: 在可能入选和希望较大选手之间安排了一场选拔赛。

sentences.english: You are a finalist in the Pillsbury Bake-Off.
sentences.chinese: 你入选皮尔斯博瑞烘焙大赛决赛了。

sentences.english: 2003 selected "People's Daily Overseas Edition" literary supplement.
sentences.chinese: 2003年入选“人民日报海外版”文艺副刊。

sentences.english: The exposition will unfurl 2008 Olympic Landscape Sculpture Designs Contest Selected Artworks Exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 2008奥运景观雕塑方案征集大赛入选艺术精品展。

sentences.english: The 3rd-grader had recently been elected to the student council at school.
sentences.chinese: 这位三年级学生刚入选校学生会不久。

sentences.english: His year exhibition of《the national cloud of rich world》was collected into big volume.
sentences.chinese: “盛世国风”年展入选并入编大型画集。

definition: to get past the qualifying round/to make it to the finals
special glory/distinction/rare honor/one's laurels/it's a privilege (to meet you)
to fail to be chosen (or elected)/to lose an election
to appear on the public roll of successful examinees (i.e. pass an exam)/to make the list/(of a song) to hit the charts
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
to elect as/to choose as/to consider as
